  2. State Department to Purge Pre-Trump X Posts in ‘One Voice’ Policy  Newsweek
  3. US State Dept wipes its X history; posts from Biden, Obama's terms to disappear | 'Aim is to limit confusion on US govt policy' | Inshorts  Inshorts
  4. US State Department wipes X history as older posts from Biden, Obama, and Trump’s first term disappear  Moneycontrol
  5. WHUT? Trump's State Department is Deleting All of Its Twitter/X Posts Prior to His Reelection???  Daily Kos
